text: Lau Province is a province in Fiji. The capital is Tubou, at the southern end of the island of Lakeba. Lau is in the Eastern Division. The province includes the Lau Islands. The island group has about 60 islands. It has a total land area of 487 square kilometers. About 9,600 people lived there in 2017. Category:Provinces of Fiji
title: Lau Province
